incident_start_time.description: The exact date and time when the incident started (ISO 8601 format)

incident_duration.description: How long the incident lasted (e.g., '2 hours 15 minutes')

incident_description.description: Brief 2-3 word description of the incident type

impacting.description: What systems, services, or users were affected (4-5 words max)

timeline.description: Chronological sequence of events during the incident with timestamps

reason_for_outage.description: Detailed technical description of what caused the incident

resolution.description: How the incident was resolved, including root cause analysis

prevention_steps.description: Concrete action items to prevent similar incidents in the future
